DESCRIPTION:
Star Sapphire is a precious variation of the sapphire that as its blue relativ have been "cooked" to gain its blue coloration, however is more translucent, with a white star highlighted in its center
LORE:
it is commonly believed that the power of inteligence is contained within the star itself and seeing it is a sure sign the gods are trying to communicate, giving hints of great importance. it also enhance the ability to read and write in many languages. A star sapphire has also been known to ornament devices which protect against magic.
